titles.title: FARA Sunshine Act of 2006

To amend the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938, as amended, to require the Attorney General to make available on the Internet website of the Department of Justice all registration statements and other documents filed with the Attorney General under such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 1/31/2006--Introduced. FARA Sunshine Act of 2006 - Amends the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938 to require the Attorney General to publish on the Department of Justice website all foreign agent registrations, informational materials, and other documents filed with the Attorney General under such Act.
